snippet: A judge in Florida ruled Monday that W.P.S. failed to follow procedure when it terminated the magicJack franchise late last year. A new hearing will be held next week.
abstract: A judge in Florida ruled Monday that W.P.S. failed to follow procedure when it terminated the magicJack franchise late last year. A new hearing will be held next week.

headline.main: Court Ruling Goes Against W.P.S., Imperiling League
